tweet_text: @RandomTTours This is what I've witnessed when updating the Horror Fiction Reviewer Directory the other day: many people are not blogging and/or blogs are gone.. Blogging is a tough gig. We do it for free & we're all going through a lot. I don't know if I'd accuse people of theft though. 1/2

tweet_text: @bostonradio2 Lesson: FOX should have never sold 25 to COX Media. I fear that COX may end up ditching the whole 25 news department (and FOX won't like that, as they want all their stations to have at least a 10pm newscast)
